about_the_game:
Breach Signal is a 1-5 Player Co-op Psychological Horror. Enter a special unit operating for the agency; lead expeditions into strange places and investigate mysterious anomalies that threaten our reality.

Explore phenomena known as dimensional breaches, which bend the laws of our reality by creating a passageway between our world and the unknown.

Seek out for missing agents, altered objects and other supernatural forces using unique investigation and measuring devices in this retrofuturistic 80’s cosmic horror atmosphere.

▼ The agency doesn't exist

And neither do you.

Take part within the “[Redacted] program”, initiated by the para-governmental organization known as the Federal Normality Agency.

You've been recruited to lead a scientific operation to investigate strange events inside giant, opaque “domes” that are mysteriously appearing all over the world.

Stay close to your team, what lies inside still remains unknown.

COOPERATION

A 1-5 co-op online multiplayer with a unique way to cooperate within your team.

COSMIC HORROR

An atmospheric cosmic horror taking part in the 80s. Explore a strangely uninhabited campsite filled with strange events and the feel of [Redacted] searching for you.

NONLINEAR SESSIONS

A procedural investigation system with different starting locations and mission objectives for each new session.

IMMERSION

A singular psychological horror experience with diegetic interfaces and physics-based interactions.

INVESTIGATION

More than 10 retro-futuristic investigation devices, and 30 altered objects & supernatural anomalies to discover.

VOICE DETECTION

A proximity voice chat that makes you able to be heard by your team, but not only by them.

GIANT DOME

A unique stylized semi-open map to feel completely lost while exploring the giant “Dome”. There will be no contact with the outside.

OTHER REALITIES

Mysterious alternate dimensions exists parallel to our “reality”. Facing [Redacted] & hallucinations will not be your only struggle.

AND MORE

  • An agency lobby to plan your investigation and equip yourself
  • More hidden secrets to uncover
  • A customizable gameplay with advanced difficulty settings, game modes...
  • Ultra wide screen support for a fully immersive experience

▼ Redefining Horror

In Breach Signal, we sought to provide a singular approach to psychological and cosmic horror.

Supernatural forces will attempt to blur the boundary between the real and the unreal, compromising ■■■■■ in your environment, your investigative equipment or even your own teammates.

▼ Dynamic & Procedural Objectives

Investigate strange places in which each session will be unique. Some of your objectives are revealed, some of them are not.

Unravel what is hidden.



Those additional FREE updates will come after the initial DEMO release.

  • More handcrafted Maps
  • More agent Skins & Emotes
  • More Investigation Equipment
  • Graphics Optimization
  • Overall Quality & Gameplay Improvements
  • Full SteamVR / Steam Deck Support
  • Full Language Localization
